verses.name: Jeremiah 51:13
verses.text: O thou that dwellest upon many waters, abundant in treasures, thine end is come, and the measure of thy covetousness.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:14
verses.text: The Lord of hosts hath sworn by himself, saying, Surely I will fill thee with men, as with caterpillers; and they shall lift up a shout against thee.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:15
verses.text: He hath made the earth by his power, he hath established the world by his wisdom, and hath stretched out the heaven by his understanding.
